mapper.select: SELECT room.r_num,room.r_money FROM room WHERE room.r_typeid=( SELECT room_type.rt_id FROM room_type WHERE room_type.rt_name=#{type}) AND room.r_id NOT IN( SELECT room_book.rb_rid FROM room_book WHERE room_book.rb_bookdate=#{date} )
SELECT * FROM room,room_book,`user` WHERE room.r_id=room_book.rb_rid AND `user`.u_id=room_book.rb_uid order by rb_id
